body:
I've noticed many people have their optifine capes still fully operating, I know that the EULA made mccapes.com close down, I never touched my cape, but is still not working. Feedback appreciated.
Thanks
Dom

title: Optifine Capes, Glitch?

replies.body: Optifine capes aren't from mccapes.com... they are from optifine xD
replies.body_tagged: Optifine capes aren't from mccapes.com... they are from optifine xD

replies.body: Can you log into your cape settings on their website?
replies.body_tagged: Can you log into your cape settings on their website?

replies.body: Thanks guys i was just being stupid, I remember now :)

replies.body: I've never had any issues with my of cape ^.^
